content:
# The iron ore has been successfully inserted into the stone furnace, which is now in a "WORKING" state. It has consumed 1 coal for fuel and is processing the iron ore.
# 
# The furnace is currently smelting the iron ore, and I can expect to receive iron plates as a result once the process is complete.
# 
# To monitor the progress, I will wait for a short period and then check the inventory of the stone furnace to see how many iron plates have been produced.

# Waiting for a moment to allow the smelting process to progress.
sleep(10)  # Waiting for 10 seconds to check the smelting progress.

# Now, I will inspect the inventory of the stone furnace to see the results.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace)
print(f"Furnace inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Checking the inventory of the stone furnace.
